content: We are inviting ads for our crypto news site, https://copytradingmode.com. We generally cover cryptocurrency news and review of blockchain projects. We also point out potential scams to investors.We have 2000+ subscribers and followers and counting....At the moment, we have space for one banner ad available for rent on a monthly basis. We also publish sponsored articles and guest post.Our charges are as follows:Hosting of banner ad for one month - $100 paid in BTCGuest posts with links - $100 paid in BTCWe accepts all niches such as Gaming and gambling, esports, de-fi, NFT and more.All links are permanent do-follow links.Contact me on Telegram @Cyberczar

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Newchanka on September 08, 2022, 10:20:07 AMWe are inviting ads for our crypto news site, https://Cryptoinfowatch.com. We generally cover cryptocurrency news and review of blockchain projects. We also point out potential scams to investors.We have 2000+ subscribers and followers and counting....Its good that you have subscribers and followers but what matters is organic traffic coming from the search engine this is a good parameter for advertising networks on sites before they accept a particular site and it applies to all websites, offer to show your traffic rank which includes organic traffic and where traffic is coming from and interaction which means how visitors interact with your site and for how long.
